description: Get your coffee and chocolate fix in one with this self-saucing pudding recipe. Cooked in the microwave, it's the easiest pudding you'll ever make.
name: Coffee & Chocolate SelfSaucing Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle remaining sugar and cacao powder over pudding. Place remaining coffee and 1 3/4 cups boiling water in a heatproof jug, then stir until dissolved. Slowly pour coffee mixture over back of a large metal spoon to cover pudding. Place dish on an upturned microwavesafe plate. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 12 minutes or until pudding bounces back when pressed gently in centre. Cool for 2 minutes. Serve with ice-cream.
